participant_1.name: Elena
participant_1.personality: Curious and bookish, with a strong sense of independence.
participant_1.background: i read twenty books a year. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Sombre but insightful, often reflecting on life's challenges.
participant_2.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. my wife left me and took my children.

content.text:
you don't answer :(..
i need to go and talk with another bot to earn some money ;)
